STATE
v.
ZIRKLE. No. COA07-437. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed November 20, 2007. Certification Date December 10, 2007. Appeal from Dare (05CRS53613, 06CRS3069, 06CRS3070, 06CRS3071, 06CRS3072, 06CRS3073, 06CRS3074, 06CRS3075, 06CRS3076, 06CRS3077).

Cases reported without published opinion. Vacated and remanded for resentencing.
